review: It is a little glitchy sometimes. In netflix, for example, it will get stuck scrolling for a while. I dont like that I cant actually turn it off, either. The biggest issue I have is that it cant be close to the router or it wont pick up, which means I cant use it in my living room, but I can use it fine in my bedroom. Overall, I am very happy with it.
